channel.title: Chess on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Chess on Game6r

item.title: Game Mind Chess 9
item.description: During Chess 9 Mind Game you will be able to train your logic and thinking. Here you are invited to try to beat the computer by moving pieces around the board. Each of the figures walks in a special way, try not to confuse. However, if you make a mistake, you simply won’t be able to complete the turn.
